item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m an amateur photographer from Slovenia who mostly enjoys shooting intimate landscape and woodland scenes. My favourite professional photographers are Thomas Heaton, Simon Baxter, Adam Gibbs, Nigel Danson, and Ben Horne. Instagram: nejc.ilenic E-mail: nejc dot ilenic at gmail dot com
